OwnGoalStudio/TrollNFC

Reads, writes, and emulates NFC cards on iPhones

Related repos

  • Android app for capturing and analyzing NFC traffic
  • Audits NFC and magnetic stripe technologies
  • NFC tag reader for Home Assistant
  • Blocks apps using NFC tags or QR codes
  • AI agent that taps and types on your iPhone across apps
  • Framework for iOS and macOS research
  • Uses China T-Union cards for UID-based access control on Apple devices
  • Automates iOS devices on Linux and Windows
  • iOS app with RAG and web search for Apple Intelligence
